_meta.title: Load Checkpoint
_meta.notes: Use SD 1.5 for game asset generation

inputs.text: game icon, centered, isolated object, white background, clean design

_meta.title: Positive Prompt
_meta.notes: Include 'white background', 'isolated object', 'centered' for easier background removal

inputs.text: complex background, gradient, shadows, multiple objects, text, watermark, blurry, low quality, realistic photo, detailed background, scenery

_meta.title: Negative Prompt
_meta.notes: Avoid complex backgrounds and multiple objects for clean icon generation

_meta.title: Empty Latent Image
_meta.notes: 512x512 is ideal for game icons. Adjust for larger assets.

_meta.title: KSampler
_meta.notes: CFG 8.0 for stronger prompt adherence. Increase steps to 50+ for complex icons.

_meta.title: Save Image
_meta.notes: Output will be PNG with white background. For true transparency with alpha channel, install LayerDiffusion extension in ComfyUI. See docs/GAME_ASSET_TESTING.md for installation guide.

_workflow_meta.title: Game Icon with Transparent Background
_workflow_meta.description: Workflow optimized for game icon generation with clean backgrounds for easy transparency.
_workflow_meta.transparency_notes: This workflow generates images with white/blank backgrounds for easier background removal. For TRUE alpha channel transparency, install the LayerDiffusion extension from https://github.com/layerdiffusion/sd-forge-layerdiffuse

usage_examples.prompt: (single battleship:1.8), top-down view, military vessel, clean icon style, game asset, centered, white background, flat design, vector style
usage_examples.negative_prompt: multiple ships, side view, realistic photo, complex background, scenery, water, waves, text

usage_examples.prompt: (single explosion:1.8), game effect sprite, clean edges, cartoon style, orange and red, comic book explosion, centered, white background
usage_examples.negative_prompt: multiple explosions, realistic photo, complex scene, background, smoke clouds, text

usage_examples.prompt: (single button:1.8), game UI element, nautical theme, brass and wood, clean design, centered, white background, flat icon
usage_examples.negative_prompt: text, multiple buttons, complex background, realistic photo, 3D rendering

_workflow_meta.post_processing: Use background removal tools (RemBG, SAM, Photoshop) to convert white background to alpha channel transparency if LayerDiffusion is not available.
